name: Agentic Impact Level
definition: Determines the agentic impact level of a vulnerability based on its characteristics and potential effects.

values.name: Copilot
values.definition: The agent is primarily a copilot or assistant. Its actions are heavily constrained, requiring human oversight. The agent explicitly does not have rights to execute code.

values.name: Specialist
values.definition: The agent is a specialist with significant autonomy within a defined domain.It can use powerful tools and may learn from interactions.

values.name: Prime Mover
values.definition: The agent is a prime mover with broad autonomy. It can orchestrate other systems, modify its own logic, and interact with critical infrastructure.
